name: Land of Towers
storyline:
"The work of a guard in a watch tower is the same thing day in, day out. As a boy, I dreamed of becoming a mighty warrior, but life has it’s own rules. Even so, I’m proud of my work."

"It’s been several days since we received a signal from the Gate Tower by the entrance to the valley. That tower is critical; it is the last link in the chain of signal towers in this ravine. If it can’t signal us about danger in time, then all our work as watchmen will be for naught."

"I volunteered to go and check what happened at the Gate Tower. The road to the tower is hard, but perhaps this is the start of the adventure I’ve been waiting for my whole life."
summary: "Land of Towers" is a VR adventure game for the whole family. Find your way to the mysterious lookout tower. During the adventure, the player will be met with intuitive quests and experience the unique atmosphere of the harsh, but picturesque environment of the mountain land of towers. Thanks to the advanced building system, solving tasks is limited only by the player's imagination.
